body:
https://github.com/diux-dev/cluster/blob/master/yuxin_numpy/pytorch_modify_test.py

```
arr = ray.get(f.remote())
arr.__class__ # => "<class 'numpy.ndarray'>"
arr+=1 # fails with  "ValueError: output array is read-only"
arr = torch.from_numpy(arr)
arr+=1  # works


```
